name: 160 Varick St.
overview:
The NYU-Poly Varick Street Incubator combines next-generation technology with highly adaptable business models. They leverage the wealth of global talent found in New York City to assist entrepreneurs.

Polytechnic Institute of New York University manages and runs the day-to-day operations of the facility, providing access to capital, markets and talent. The incubator is part of a larger set of technology entrepreneurship initiatives with a specific focus on global information technology, health and wellness and urban sustainability.

The incubator is open to all start-up businesses, but is particularly targeted toward the following industry sectors: â€¢ Cleantech â€¢ Biotech â€¢ Cybersecurity â€¢ Digital and Social Media â€¢ Financial Technology â€¢ Information Technology

Supporting Member of the Business Incubator Association of New York State.
